bigSeries.name: HP Z2 Tower G9 Workstation Desktop PC (Kombucha)

smallSeries.name: HP Z2 Tower G9 Workstation Desktop PC

model.name: HP Z2 Tower G9 Workstation Desktop PC (4N3U8AV)

details.name: Sustainable impact specifications
details.value: Ocean-bound plastic in speaker enclosure; 45% post-consumer recycled plastic; 25% ITE-derived closed loop plastic; Bulk packaging available; 80 Plus® Gold power supplies available; Molded paper pulp cushion inside box is 100% sustainably sourced and recyclable; Ocean-bound plastic in speaker enclosure and system fan; Contains recycled metal

details.name: Ports
details.value: 4 SuperSpeed USB Type-A 10Gbps signaling rate (1 charging); 1 universal audio jack, 1 audio-in; 1 audio-out; 1 RJ-45; 2 DisplayPort™ 1.4; 2 SuperSpeed USB Type-A 10Gbps signaling rate; 1 SuperSpeed USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate; 3 USB Type-A 480Mbps signaling rate

details.name: Expansion slots
details.value: 1 PCIe 3 x4 (x16 connector); 1 PCIe 3 x4 (x4 connector); 1 PCIe 3 x1 (x4 connector); 1 PCIe 5 x16 (x16 connector); 1 M.2 2230 PCIe 3 X1 for WLAN

details.name: Expansion slots note
details.value: 1 M.2 2230 slot for WLAN and 3 M.2 2280 slots for storage

details.name: Ports
details.value: 4 SuperSpeed USB Type-A 10Gbps signaling rate (1 charging); 1 universal audio jack

details.name: Ports
details.value: 1 audio-in; 1 audio-out; 1 RJ-45; 2 DisplayPort™ 1.4; 2 SuperSpeed USB Type-A 10Gbps signaling rate; 1 SuperSpeed USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate; 3 USB Type-A 480Mbps signaling rate

Compatible displays
details.value: All HP Z Displays and HP DreamColor Displays are supported. For more information see www.hp.com/go/zdisplays

details.name: Internal drive bays
details.value: One 2.5" HDD; Two 3.5" HDD; Three M.2 NVME 2280 SSD

details.name: Internal Storage
details.value: 512 GB PCIe® Gen4 NVMe™ M.2 SSD

details.name: Storage controller
details.value: Integrated SATA (4 ports 6 Gb/s) with integrated RAID 0, 1, for PCIe SSDs supported. Requires identical hard drives (speeds, capacity, interface).

details.name: Features
details.value: HP 125 Wired Keyboard; HP Secure Erase; HP Sure Click; HP BIOSphere Gen6; HP Sure Admin; Hood Sensor Optional Kit; HP Client Security Manager Gen6; HP Sure Start Gen7; HP Sure Recover Gen4; HP Sure Sense Gen2; HP Sure Run Gen5; 4 SuperSpeed USB Type-A 10Gbps signaling rate (1 charging); 1 universal audio jack; Ocean-bound plastic in speaker enclosure; 45% post-consumer recycled plastic; 25% ITE-derived closed loop plastic; Bulk packaging available; 80 Plus® Gold power supplies available; Molded paper pulp cushion inside box is 100% sustainably sourced and recyclable; Ocean-bound plastic in speaker enclosure and system fan; Contains recycled metal

details.name: Feature supporting point
details.value: Work anywhere without compromising on performance or security with Windows 11 powered by HP's collaboration and connectivity technology.

details.name: Feature supporting point
details.value: Run several CPU–heavy programs simultaneously without sacrificing performance with an Intel® Core™ i7 processor.

details.name: Feature supporting point
details.value: The stunning new design features front and rear ledges, so you can easily move your system from location to location.

details.name: Feature supporting point
details.value: Evolve your work. Evolve your rig. With a tool-less sliding access cover, you can easily get into the the interior, and customize your Z to fit your needs.

details.name: Feature supporting point
details.value: Innovatively designed to keep hardware components cool and quiet no matter how hard you push it. Have confidence to run your system at max load 24/7.

details.name: Feature supporting point
details.value: Z's industry-leading thermals keep the processor and graphics card cool, so they can run at max performance for extended periods of time.

details.name: Feature supporting point
details.value: Help keep your system clean while sitting on the factory floor or machining environment with the front-access dust filter.

details.name: Feature supporting point
details.value: Designed to be wiped down using many commonly available household disinfecting and cleaning wipes using the HP cleaning guidelines.

details.name: Flex value prop 1 supporting point
details.value: 100% of Z by HP Workstations include ocean-bound and/or recycled plastics[1]

details.name: Flex value prop 2 supporting point
details.value: HP Wolf Security is a hardware-enforced, resilient defense that ensures your protection from cyber attacks.[2]

details.name: Flex value prop 3 supporting point
details.value: Work with confidence knowing your PC has been tested for heavy workloads and environments.

details.name: Flex value prop 4 supporting point
details.value: Innovatively designed to keep hardware components cool and quiet no matter how hard you push it.

details.name: Footnote [01]
details.value: [1] HP Wolf Security for Business requires Windows 10 or higher, includes various HP security features and is available on HP Pro, Elite, RPOS and Workstation products. See product details for included security features and OS requirement.

details.name: Footnote [02]
details.value: [2] MIL STD testing is not intended to demonstrate fitness for U.S. Department of Defense contract requirements or for military use.  Test results are not a guarantee of future performance under these test conditions.  Accidental Damage or damage under these test conditions requires an optional HP Accidental Damage Protection Care Pack.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [1] Not all features are available in all editions or versions of Windows. Systems may require upgraded and/or separately purchased hardware, drivers, software or BIOS update to take full advantage of Windows functionality. Windows is automatically updated and enabled. High speed internet and Microsoft account required. ISP fees may apply and additional requirements may apply over time for updates. See http://www.windows.com.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [3] For detailed OS/hardware support information for Linux, see:  http://www.hp.com/support/linux_hardware_matrix .

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [4] Multicore is designed to improve performance of certain software products. Not all customers or software applications will necessarily benefit from use of this technology. Performance and clock frequency will vary depending on application workload and your hardware and software configurations. Intel’s numbering, branding and/or naming is not a measurement of higher performance.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [5] For full Intel® vPro™ functionality, Windows 11 Pro 64 bit, a vPro supported processor, vPro enabled chipset, vPro enabled wired LAN and/or WLAN card and TPM 2.0 are required. Some functionality requires additional 3rd party software in order to run. See http://intel.com/vpro .

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [6] Multi-core is designed to improve performance of certain software products. Not all customers or software applications will necessarily benefit from use of this technology. Performance and clock frequency will vary depending on application workload and your hardware and software configurations. Intel’s numbering, branding and/or naming is not a measurement of higher performance.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [7] Intel® Turbo Boost performance varies depending on hardware, software and overall system configuration. See http://www.intel.com/technology/turboboost/ for more information.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value:
[8] Flex IO port and one PCIe slot will be occupied when Thunderbolt is installed. About Thunderbolt compatibility, please refer to the FAQ of Thunderbolt community.
https://www.thunderbolttechnology.net/tech/faq .

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [9] Keyboard and Mouse are optional or add on features.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [10] Specific chassis required for 550 W 92% efficient, wide-ranging, active PFC power supply.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [13] Based on US EPEAT® registration according to IEEE 1680.1-2018 EPEAT®. EPEAT® status varies by country. Visit www.epeat.net for more information.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [16] HP Performance Advisor Software - HP Performance Advisor is ready and waiting to help you get the most out of your HP Workstation from day one—and every day after. Learn more or download at: https://www8.hp.com/us/en/workstations/performance-advisor.html

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [17] HP Support Assistant requires Windows and Internet access.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [18] HP Manageability Integration Kit can be downloaded from http://www8.hp.com/us/en/ads/clientmanagement/overview.html

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [19] HP Client Security Manager Gen7 requires Windows and is available on the select HP PCs.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [20] HP BIOSphere Gen6 features may vary depending on the platform and configurations.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [21] HP Sure Click requires Windows 11 Pro or Enterprise. See https://bit.ly/2PrLT6A_SureClick for complete details.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [22] HP Sure Start Gen7 is available on select HP PCs and workstations. See product specifications for availability.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [23] HP Sure Run Gen5 is available on select HP PCs and requires Windows 10 and higher.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [24] HP Sure Recover Gen4 is available on select HP PCs and requires an open network connection. You must back up important files, data, photos, videos, etc. before using HP Sure Recover to avoid loss of data.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [25] HP Secure Erase for the methods outlined in the National Institute of Standards and Technology Special Publication 800-88 "Clear" sanitation method. HP Secure Erase does not support platforms with Intel® Optane™.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [26] HP Sure Sense requires Windows 11 Pro or Enterprise and supports Microsoft Internet Explorer, Google Chrome™, and Chromium™. Supported attachments include Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and PDF files in read only mode, when Microsoft Office or Adobe Acrobat are installed.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [27] A certified preloaded version of Ubuntu® 20.04 LTS is available from HP for this platform.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [28] Wireless access point and Internet service required and sold separately. Availability of public wireless access points limited. Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) is backwards compatible with prior 802.11 specs. Wi-Fi 7 not available with 12th Gen Intel ADL processors; Wi-Fi 7 (802.11BE) functionality requires Windows 11 24H2, select Intel® processor, and a Wi-Fi 7 router, sold separately. Wi-Fi 7 is backwards compatible with prior 802.11 specs. Available in countries where Wi-Fi 7 is supported.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [29] Due to the non-industry standard nature of some third-party memory modules, we recommend HP branded memory to ensure compatibility. If you mix memory speeds, the system will perform at the lower memory speed.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [30] Intel I350-T4 4-port GbE NIC is an AMO only.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [31] TCO Certified configurations available when ENERGY STAR configurations are selected with a USB type C connector. ENERGY STAR available with a combination of high-performance CPU’s, high-performance GPU’s and select memory configurations.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [32] NVIDIA® T400 (2 GB GDDR6 dedicated) may go End of Life in late 2022.

details.name: Tech spec footnote
details.value: [33] HP Sure Admin requires Windows 10 or higher, HP BIOS, HP Manageability Integration Kit from http://www.hp.com/go/clientmanagement and HP Sure Admin Local Access Authenticator smartphone app from the Android or Apple store.

details.name: Graphics (discrete)
details.value: NVIDIA RTX™️ A2000 (12 GB GDDR6 dedicated)

details.name: Headline
details.value: Your new benchmark for entry workstation power

details.name: Key selling point
details.value: Designed for zero throttling so you can render, simulate, and real-time ray trace without overheating or lags.

details.name: Key selling point
details.value: Unleash the power of professional graphics and an Intel® Core™  processor on intensive multi-threaded apps. Designed for zero throttling so you can render, simulate, and even real-time ray trace without overheating or slow downs.

details.name: Headline
details.value: Built to expand. Power to grow

details.name: Key selling point
details.value: With room to expand and tool-less access, you can easily upgrade and add components as your needs evolve.

details.name: Key selling point
details.value: Need to upgrade graphics? Add specialized PCIe cards? With room to expand and tool-less access, you can add components as your needs evolve. This is an investment that will last.

details.name: Key selling point
details.value: Work with confidence knowing your PC is certified with leading software applications to ensure peak performance[3]

details.name: Key selling point
details.value: Work with confidence knowing your PC is certified with leading software applications to ensure peak performance[3]

details.name: Memory and storage
details.value: 16 GB memory; 1 TB HDD storage; 512 GB SSD storage

details.name: Memory
details.value: 16 GB DDR5-4800 MHz RAM (1 x 16 GB)

details.name: Legal tagline
details.value: HP recommends Windows 11 Pro for business

details.name: Processor
details.value: Intel® Core™ i7-14700 (up to 5.4 GHz with Intel® Turbo Boost Technology, 33 MB L3 cache, 16 cores, 28 threads)

details.name: Overview
details.value: Experience a whole new level of performance for your professional workflow. The Z2 Tower is engineered to seamlessly run multi-threaded apps for fast rendering, simulation, and now real-time ray tracing. And when your demands change, you have impressive expandability to upgrade.

details.name: Overview
details.value: The Z2 Tower is engineered to seamlessly run multi-threaded apps for fast rendering, simulation, and now real-time ray tracing. And when your demands change, you have expandability to upgrade.
